body_html:
I also discovered that when I run the "old" optimize_for_inference tool on the .pb file I get the following error when trying to load the created optimized graph:

NodeDef expected inputs '' do not match 1 inputs specified;
Op<name=Const; signature= -> output:dtype; attr=value:tensor; attr=dtype:type>;
NodeDef: import/bn_Conv1_2/cond/batchnorm/add/y = Constdtype=DT_FLOAT, value=Tensor<type: float shape: [] values: 0.001>
